rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small reception area leading to the split-level living spaces.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan space blending seamlessly into an adjoining kitchen, designed in Bohemian style with vibrant colors and eclectic decor.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet rustic kitchen integrated into the living area, featuring a large island for informal dining or work.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the open-plan kitchen and living room, providing a spacious area for family meals and gatherings.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with ample closet space, positioned near the entrance for easy access.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite featuring an ensuite bathroom and a private balcony overlooking the garden. Placed in the east to harness morning sunlight according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Children's Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two adjoining rooms designed for children, ensuring both privacy and safety, situated on the north side as per local norms.

openings.description: A wide entrance with decorative elements that welcome guests.
Provides access to the garden and outdoor living spaces.
A small balcony offering views of the garden, in accordance with Vastu for a serene outlook.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: A quiet space for work or study, designed with ample natural light from the east window.

rooms.name: Family Lounge
rooms.description: An informal living area for family time, featuring Bohemian style decor and comfortable seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: An extra bedroom designed to provide privacy for teenagers or as a flexible space for home offices.

openings.description: Provides safe and convenient access between ground and upper floors.
A small balcony offering natural light and ventilation.
